objects.text:
• Classic Retro-Styled Design
• X-Trans CMOS Sensor
• High-Precision Viewfinder
• Multiple Manual Control Dials

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera design
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS sensor for exceptional image quality
• Versatile interchangeable lens system compatibility
• High-precision electronic viewfinder
• Multiple manual control dials for professional-grade settings
• Durable black metal construction
• Built-in hot shoe for external accessories
• Ergonomic grip for comfortable handling
• Advanced autofocus system for precise shooting
• Compatible with Fujifilm's renowned X-mount lenses
• Compact and lightweight body ideal for travel photography
• Perfect balance of professional features and user-friendly operation

banner_details:
This promotional banner showcases a modern product display layout for a digital camera. The design features a dark, grid-patterned background that adds depth and a subtle tech-inspired aesthetic. Positioned prominently to the right is a high-quality product image ("product_image"). Bold and futuristic typography is used for the main headline ("heading") and subheading ("subheading"), drawing attention immediately. Supporting information includes a sleek tagline ("tagline"), a concise feature list ("description"), and a prominent price tag ("price"). The design is anchored at the bottom by a vivid call-to-action button with impactful contrast, consisting of a colored rectangle ("cta_background") and text ("cta"). 

**Color Palette:**
- Background black: `#111111`
- Mid-gray accents: `#1A1A1A`, `#222222`, `#252525`
- Highlight red: `#FF3333`
- Light gray text: `#B0B0B0`
- White text: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a Fujifilm X-T10 camera primarily in a sophisticated matte black finish (#1A1A1A), giving it a sleek and professional look. Accents of metallic silver (#C0C0C0) are used on the dials and lens rings, adding contrast and definition. Subtle touches of white (#FFFFFF) in the branding and dial markings help readability and branding clarity. Warm tones such as amber-orange (#FF8C00) are used in small highlights like aperture pointers, drawing attention subtly. The lens glass reflects hues of cyan-green (#66FFCC) and soft yellow (#FFFF99), creating a vibrant lens flare effect. The palette blends cool and warm tones, balancing sophistication with focus.
